title: [Announcement] High-Logic released FontCreator 7
content:
High-Logic recently released FontCreator 7 , introducing OpenType layout features, web font support, optical metrics, and a lot more.

Detailed information, screen shots, and a trial version are available through the product page.  
 [http://www.high-logic.com/font-editor/fontcreator.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809232055/http:/www.high-logic.com/font-editor/fontcreator.html "http://www.high-logic.com/font-editor/fontcreator.html")

We appreciate feedback; both here and at the forum:  
 [http://forum.high-logic.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809232055/http:/forum.high-logic.com/ "http://forum.high-logic.com/")
author: erwindenissen
